name: social-network-tools
short_description:
Many social networks have buttons to share page with friends, but probably these buttons were made for social network to increase rating than for users, because user cannot share page if website owner did not put button to page...

Here we created browser extensions for users to have ability share any pages you are visiting:
http://googleplusone.pretty-tools.com/ Google +1 Button for Internet Explorer and Firefox
http://odnoklassniki.pretty-tools.com/ Klass Button for Internet Explorer, Firefox and Chrome
http://mailru.pretty-tools.com/ Nravitsya Button for Internet Explorer, Firefox and Chrome
http://vkontakte.pretty-tools.com/ VKontakte Button for Internet Explorer, Firefox and Chrome
